scripts.build: tsdown src/bin/bon.ts --format esm --out-dir dist/bin && cp -r src/templates dist/ && mkdir -p dist/docs/topics dist/docs/schemas && cp ./content/index.md dist/docs/_index.md && cp ./content/overview.md ./content/getting-started.md dist/docs/topics/ && cp ./content/modeling/*.md dist/docs/topics/ && cp ./content/dashboards/*.md dist/docs/topics/
